title: vcxn Bluetooth Tansmitter Connect to Cellphone,Inductive Transmit Audio Sound to Invisible Wireless Earpiece for Covert Communication and Music Listening
features: Bluetooth Transmitter Box & Inductive: the transmitter connects to cellphone by Bluetooth 4.1 technology, it's built in inductive which can transmit the audio sound to the mini wireless earpiece through electromagnetic enlistment
Mini Wireless Earpiece: the mini earpiece receive sound from the inductive and play back by the internal micro speaker which allow you listen the sound from cellphone to black box to earpiece
Compatible with smart phone, android phones, tablets, kindle, eReaders, and any portable devices with Bluetooth connection

The transmitter built-in microphone, and auto answer function to answer phone calls to your cellphone, the volume up/down key for volume adjust, you also can control the volume by cellphone or other device
The small earpiece with optimum anatomic design for comfortable wear. Easy and safe to wear, with a antenna for easy and pick out from earhole.
description: Overview The bluetooth transmitter with invisible earpiece kits has two parts, the black box is an bluetooth transmitter with inductive which can connects to cellphone though bluetooth and transmit audio sound through electromagnetic enlistment to the mini wireless earpiece, the earpiece receives the sound from the inductive and play by the internal speaker Operation Guide Please charge the bluetooth transmitter before use, move the power switch to "ON" position, the red & blue LED lights will flash, open your cellphone and go to bluetooth setting, you will see the bluetooth name "ear980", click and connect it, and install a 337 battery in to the mini earpiece, put the earpiece to your earhole, and put the bluetooth transmitter under your collar, you will listen to the sounds when you make phone call or play music on your cellphone When connected with cellphone, the transmitter will auto answer the phone calls in 2 rings, no need to press any buttons. Note: Please keep the earpiece with the bluetooth transmitter distance no more than 6 inches, you should attached the transmitter under your collar, can’t put it on chest, because the inductive transmission maximum range is 6 inches, over this distance, the sound is low or even can’t listening the sound, you also need to adjust the earpiece direction in your earhole to get loud sounds, please do not insert too deep into your earhole, the earpiece antenna can’t receive signals from the inductive, you need to check the antenna is a little bit out of your earhole. please do not buy it if you want use it for long distance, it will not functional, the transmit range is short, please be careful before purchase. Package Content 1 x Bluetooth Transmitter & Inductive Box 1 x Earpiece 2 x 337 Batteries
